metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2212 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In poisson_distribution of random, there is an out of bounds read. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9 Android-10Android ID: A-139690488

criterions.comment: libc++: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
